revision.text: Possibly: Experiments and observations on animal heat, and the inflammation of combustible bodies; being An Attempt to Resolve these phenomena into a general law of nature. By A. Crawford, M.D. F.R.S. L. and E. and member of the Philosophical Societies of Dublin and Philadelphia. (Adair Crawford). 2nd ed. (London : Printed for J. Johnson, No 72, St. Paul's Church-yard, M.DCC.LXXXVIII. [1788]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2502257~S1
